title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Key Hamas Leader in Rafah: Salama Muhammad Abu Ajaj Eliminated”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF eliminated a central terrorist figure from the General Security apparatus of the Hamas terror organization in Rafah.

IAF fighter jets, guided by intelligence from the Intelligence Division, attacked and eliminated Salama Muhammad Abu Ajaj last night (Thursday), a leading figure in the General Security apparatus of the Hamas terror organization in the Rafah area. The General Security apparatus serves as a “cover” for Hamas’s military wing and plays crucial roles in ensuring the organization’s survival, managing the ongoing military operations of Hamas, and disrupting the IDF’s operational freedom in the Gaza Strip.
As part of his activities, Ajaj worked towards the continued foundation and military strengthening of the terror organization in the Rafah area.

It is reported that as a result of the attack, the terrorist Iyad Al-Ma’ari, the mayor of northern Nazareth, was also killed.

Iyad Al-Ma’ari was a terrorist with a rich background in the Hamas terror organization; he previously operated as part of the “West Bank Headquarters” of Hamas and had played a significant role in directing attacks in the Judea and Samaria region.

Attached is the identity card of the terrorist Salama Muhammad Abu Ajaj: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC07062024547576
